name: Lucky's Park Incident
description:
This is a short horror game where you collect 10 items like slenderman.

Story: You are one of those meddling kids who always try to steal Lucky's cereal. Lucky, however, happens to be off of his daily medications and has gone insane. He will do anything to keep all of his lucky charms. Some of these methods require blood. Can you collect all ten boxes and escape? 

stone texture: Seamless Texture 5 by AGF81 on DeviantArt

music/sfx: Royalty Free Background Music Downloads - Fesliyan Studios

!artwork is directly inspired by Dave Microwaves Games
